S.FORM: tɕendɤre tɤ-pɤtso ra sɯŋgɯ nɯ ɲɤ-ɬoʁ-nɯ tɕe,
ɲɯ-tɯ-nɯ-ɬoʁ tɕe tɕe ɲɯ-ru-nɯ tɕe nɯ ɯ-ndɤcu nɯtɕu,
kha nɯ kɯ-wxtɯ-wxti ʑo rŋɤrŋɤt ci pjɤ-tu. X
tɕe kha nɯ wuma ʑo pjɤ-wxti tɕe,
ri ɯ-khɯɣɲɟɯ nɯra rcanɯ, li kɯ-fsɯ-fsoʁ ʑo pjɤ-ŋu. X
tɤtʂu kɯ-fsɯ-fsoʁ ʑo kɯ-tu ci pjɤ-ŋu.
tɕe ɲɤ-ɕe-nɯ tɕendɤre, nɤkinɯ ɲɤ-zɣɯt-nɯ tɕe
kha nɯ, ɯ-kɯm nɯnɯ, tɯrme ʁnɯz jamar ʑo kɯ-mbro pjɤ-ŋu.
tɕe kɯ-wxtɯ-wxti ʑo pjɤ-ŋu, X
kɯm ɯ-taʁ nɯtɕu ɕɤmloʁ ci pjɤ-ndzoʁ.
ɕɤmloʁ ci pjɤ-ndzoʁ tɕendɤre, nɤki,
jaʁmu tɤ-pɤtso nɯ kɯ "a-pi ra, nɤkinɯ, ɯ-kɯm ɕɯ-nɤrkhɯrkhɯβ-i je" to-ti. X
tɕendɤre ɲɤ-ɕe-nɯ ri, nɤkinɯ,
kɯm nɯ ɯ-tɯ-mbro kɯ tɤ-pɤtso nɯ, jaʁmu tɤ-pɤtso nɯ pjɤ-mbɤr qhe mɯ-pjɤ-ɕaβ.
tɕe ɯ-pi kɯ-wxti nɯ kɯ lo-nɤrkhɯrkhɯβ pjɤ-ra. X
tɕe kɯm la-nɤrkhɯrkhɯβ tɕe, toʁde tɕe,
tɤ-mu ɯ-ʁzɯɣ ra kɯ-βdɯ-βdi ci chɤ-nɯɬoʁ tɕe nɯ-kɯm to-cɯ.
nɯ-kɯm ta-cɯ tɕe pɯ́-wɣ-mto-nɯ tɕe
"amaŋ, nɯʑora ɕɯ tɯ-ŋu-nɯ, tɕhi ɯ-kɯ-pa jɤ-tɯ-ɣe-nɯ,
kɯki mɤ-tɯ-tso-nɯ thaŋ ma,
kɯki tɕe srɯtphu ɯ-kha ɕti tɕe, X
srɯtphu nɯ kɯ tɕe tɤ-pɤtso tu-ndze ɕti tɕe,
nɯ tɕhi ɯ-kɯ-pa jɤ-tɯ-ɣe-nɯ?" to-ti.
tɕeri jaʁmu tɤ-pɤtso nɯ kɯ "a-ɬaʁ, wortɕhi ʑo" X
"aʑo nɯ ɣɯ ɯ-rʑaβ ŋu-a" to-ti.
"srɯtphu nɯ ɣɯ ɯ-rʑaβ aʑo ŋu-a" to-ti. X
tɕendɤre jaʁmu tɤ-pɤtso nɯ kɯ "a-ɬaʁ, wortɕhi ʑo ci ku-kɯ-sɯrma-j ɯ́-jɤɣ ma,
iʑora sɯŋgɯ zɯ pɯ-rɤʑi-j ri maka, pjɤ-nɯkɯlu-j ma,
nɯra ntsɯ pɯ-fse-j, nɯra pɯ-raŋ-i tɕe,
maka ji-tɯ-mtsɯr ji-tɯ-nɤndʐo ɲɯ-saχaʁ ʑo tɕe, X
ci ku-kɯ-sɯrma-j ɯ́-jɤɣ?" to-ti.
tɕeri, nɤkinɯ, iɕqha nɯ, tɤ-mu nɯ kɯ
"a tɕe mɤxsi matɕi, X
tha /tɤpɤ/ tɤ-pɤtso tu-ndze ɕti tɕe, nɤkinɯ,
a-mɤ-tɤ-tɯ́-wɣ-ndza-nɯ ma mɤ-pe" to-ti.
tɕe jaʁmu tɤ-pɤtso nɯ kɯ "a-ɬaʁ wortɕhi ʑo,
/chɤlɤnnɤ, ɲɯ-tɯ-nɯkhɤde tɕe, iʑora, (210)
iʑora nɤki, chɤlɤnnɤ ɣɯ-znɯzdɯxpa-j tɕe ɣɯ-lɤt-i thaŋ wo" to-ti. X
tɕe tɤ-mu nɯ kɯ "wo, mɤxsi matɕi tɕe, X
iɕqha nɯ, ku-ta-rtoʁ-nɯ qhe wuma ʑo ɲɯ-ta-nɤjndɤt-nɯ rɯtɕi tɕetha,
nɤki jɯɣmɯr jamar ci ku-ta-nɤtsɯ-nɯ tɕetha,
ɯ-mɤ-kɤ-mto tu-βze-a ɯ-mɤ́-cha-a?" to-ti. (226)
tɕendɤre kha ɯ-ŋgɯ lo-sɯɣe qhendɤre, X
nɤkinɯ, ɲɤ-znɯzdɯxpa qhe lo-sɯɣe qhendɤre, X
kha ɯ-rkɯ nɯtɕu, nɤkinɯ,
sqhi ɯ-rkɯ nɯtɕu kó-wɣ-sɤmdzɯ-nɯ.
/sqi/ sqhi ɯ-rkɯ nɯtɕu ka-sɤmdzɯ tɕe,
"je kutɕu kɤ-ɤ nɯ mdzɯ-nɯ tɕe, thɯ-nɯmbjɯm-nɯ je" ra to-ti. (245)
tɕendɤre tɤ-pɤtso ra nɯra ko-k-ɤmdzɯ-nɯ-ci.
tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, nɯ jamar tɕendɤre, nɤkinɯ,
kɯm ɯ-kɯ-nɤrkhɯrkhɯβ, lɤβdelɤŋu-ɣjɤn ʑo to-nɤrkhɯrkhɯβ rca, (255)
ɯ-tɤ??? ɯ-xɕɤt kɯ pha kha ʑo tu-sɤndzɯrndzɯr pjɤ-ŋu. (300) X
tɕendɤre nɤkinɯ, tɤ-mu nɯ kɯ, nɤkinɯ, tɤ-pɤtso, "mbɤt, kɤ-ɤnbaʁ-nɯ ɲɯ-mda" to-ti.
tɕendɤre nɤki, khri ɯ-pa zɯ ko-sɤnbaʁ
khri ɯ-pa zɯ ko-sɤnbaʁ tɕe tɕe
tɕendɤre kɯm ɕ-to-cɯ. X
tɕe nɯ jamar tɕe tɕe, srɯtphu nɯ jo-nɯɣi ndʐa pjɤ-ŋu tɕe tɕe,
lo-ɣi tɕe tɕe ɯ-ŋga ra pjɤ-qaʁ tɕe ɯ-thoʁ zɯ nɯ fse ʑo pjɤ-βde tɕe,
"a-pɤri ɯ-tɤ-tɯ-mɲo-t?" nɯra to-ti.
tɕendɤre /kɤ kɤ/ nɤki, jamar tɕe tɕe nɤki,
khɤɕkhɤr zɯ ko-k-ɤmdzɯ-ci tɕe,
tɤ-mu nɯ kɯ tʂha tɯ-phoŋ lo-kho. X
tɕe nɯ ɯ-jaʁ ɯ-ntsi kɯ ko-sɯndo,
wo mɯ-pjɤ-ʑɯ nɤma, tɕe sqhi ɯ-taʁ nɯtɕu, qaʑo kɯ-mdoʁmdi ci pjɤ-k-ɤta-ci. X
tɕendɤre nɤkinɯ, tɤ-mu nɯ kɯ, nɯra tɤ-kɤ-mɲo pjɤ-ɕti qhe tɕe,
srɯtphu nɯ kɯ tʂha nɯ ɲɤ-mɟa qhe, qhlɯβnɤqhlɯβ ʑo ko-tshi, X
ɯ-jaʁ ɯ-ntsi nɯ kɯ qaʑo ɯ-mi ɯ-ntsi ɲɤ-sɯphɯt qhe,
kɤ́-ɕɤrɯrɯ ʑo rŋɤβnɤrŋɤβ ʑo to-ndza.
to-ndza qhe tɕendɤre nɤkinɯ, koŋla mɤ-kɯ-smi pjɤ-ɕti qhe,
ɯ-se pjɤ-tu qhe, X
ɯ-mtɕhi cho ɯ-jaʁ ra tɤ-se kɯ ɲɤ-zɣɯrni ʑo.
ri nɯnɯ stu ɯ-kɤ-rga, ɯ-kɤ-nɤmɯm pjɤ-ɕti.
tɕe nɯra tha-ɕkɯt jamar tɕe,
ɯ-ɕna akɯ ci /ɲɤ/ ko-ɕthɯz tɕe, andi ci ɲɤ-ɕthɯz tɕe,
"m, aʑo kɯɲidi ci ɲɯ-mtsham-a" to-ti.
tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, tɤ-mu nɯ kɯ "wo nɯ iɕqha wajɯ ɯ-ɕa ci tɤ-mɲo-t-a tɕe, nɯ ɕti thaŋ wo" to-ti.
tɕeri, nɤki, iɕqha srɯtphu nɯ kɯ "m, aʑo kutɕu kha ɯ-ŋgɯ kutɕu a-ɕna kɤ-mtshɤm ma a-rna mɤ-kɤ-mtshɤm ci tu" to-ti. X
tɕendɤre nɤki, nɯ jamar qhe to-ndzur qhe,
ndɤre to-sɤtɕitʂi ʑo qhe, nɤkinɯ, ɯ-sɤ-rŋgɯ tɕe to-nɯɕe.
